knimeNode.name: WKT Geometry Filter
knimeNode.shortDescription: Filtering rows with WKT geometries through a bounding box.

fullDescription.intro: This node takes as input a table with a geometry column in Well Know Text (WKT) and the coordinates of a rectangle. The node will output a table like the input table with only the rows that are inside the rectangle.
fullDescription.option: String containing the location in WKT
Specifies if the input data positions are either lat/lon or lon/lat.
The minimum Latitude of the bounding box.
The maximum Latitude of the bounding box.
The minimum Longitude of the bounding box.
The minimum Longitude of the bounding box.
The maximum Longitude of the bounding box.

ports.outPort: This port contains the rows that fall within the bounding box area selected in the settings.
